Flub.Name: Method
Flub.Description: The method used for calculating normals.

Flub.Name: 8-point
Flub.Description: Use a 8x8 matrix. Uses more references to calculate normals with higher accuracy.

Flub.Name: 4-point
Flub.Description: Use a 4x4 matrix. Uses fewer references to calculate normals with basic accuracy.

Flub.Name: Weight
Flub.Description: The weight of the normals. Higher values create more intense normals. (Only available in 8-point Method)

Flub.Name: Height
Flub.Description: The height of the normals. Higher values create more intense/taller normals. (Only available in the 4-point Method)

Flub.Name: Flip Y
Flub.Description: Flip the normals on the Y axis.

Flub.Name: Flip X
Flub.Description: Flip the normals on the X axis.
